name: Meowtastic Doom!
description:
This game was made in a month for the Secret Santa 2021 jam.It was a combination of Cuphead and Binding of Issacc.My giftee left tho :(
Nonetheless i hope you guys like it.It's my first time make a roguelike game.

Credits: Mow VA: https://jepp.itch.io/
Main menu music: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIMguYTK_0TqHk6PALKWfWw
ding sound: "Bike, Bell Ding, Single, 01-01.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
Cave cutscene music: https://freesound.org/people/ADnova/sounds/435531/
Cave in game music: https://freesound.org/people/TheoTeravainen/sounds/510800/
thump:https://freesound.org/people/theshaggyfreak/sounds/274942/
pickaxe swishes:https://freesound.org/people/PhilStrahl/sounds/497037/
Artist and Dev:Me
font:https://www.dafont.com/mickey.fontK

Known issue: Dying at the boss turns off the camera,thus it seem like the game is crushing,this will be fixed tommorow asap!

Controls:Arrows key or w a s d to move
Space to shoot
Enter to interact
